name: places/ChIJT8Sfcb1YwokRVPdtrtIVRMU
formattedAddress: 1000 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1000 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028-0934, USA

originalText.text: I will always be greatful to Dr Jonathan Raskin for standing by me when no other doctor would. After consulting with two other pulmonary specialists who refused to keep me as a patient unless I had invasive surgery I was referred to Dr Raskin who clearly saw me as not only a lung problem but also a young mother who had reasons to be reluctant to have surgery so fast. He made sure I understood my options if I did/didn't have surgery carefully explaining to me what the worst case senecio would be if I choose not to have immediate surgery and kindly allowed me to choose myself while agreeing be my doctor if I had surgery or not. I chose to take things slowly and Dr Raskin followed my progress. I had only two more pneumothoraxes within that year and they stopped happening as fast as they started. I've continued to see Dr R. Throughout the years for various medical issues. He has all the latest medical equipment in his office and I've never had to go somewhere else for tests or blood.  I moved out of town and recently had a cyst show up on a ct scan in a place in my lung next to my aorta. I was told again I needed to have surgery within the year. I have had all my records sent to Dr Raskin and I will only have the surgery If he tells me it must be done. I trust Dr. Raskin's opinion when it comes to every aspect of my medical care. Anyone who has Dr Jonathan Raskin on their medical team is in the best of care. This is a doctor who truly cares about his patients well being.
